title: Maksim Nizovtsev
text:
Maksim Pavlovich Nizovtsev (; born 9 September 1972 in <a href="Kostanay">Kostanay</a>) is a <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a>i professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. Nizovtsev has also played for the <a href="Kazakhstan%20national%20football%20team">Kazakhstan national football team</a> in 16 games scoring 2 goals from 1994 to 2005.
He previously played for <a href="FC%20Chernomorets%20Novorossiysk">FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk</a> in the <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a>.
